sequence:
A Date With Atago

<size=45>Chapter 2: Let's Go!</size>

scripts.say: Ah, good morning, Commander. You're up early today.
You're half an hour early, you know? Could it be... you thought that your big sister would be waiting for you wistfully?
You'd be getting a little ahead of yourself~ The reason I came so early was... look over there.
Atago? And... Commander? Did you two also come here to carry out morning training?
Not quite. Ah, before I forget, this is for you.
Atago took a sports drink out of her bag and passed it to Takao.
Thank you very much. Ah, Commander, Atago always helps me refuel during my morning training. You could say it's become a routine.
O-of course I refused at first, but she was so insistent...
Oh my. Who was the one who refused to take even a single sip of water while yelling something like "MY BURNING SPIRIT SHALL SUSTAIN ME" until she finally passed out in the middle of a combat drill?
...Pfffftt! Ahem... uhh, in any case, are you taking the day off, Commander?
*giggles* Takao~ aren't you the curious one? Between us girls...
Atago whispered something into Takao's ear.
Wh-what!? Commander! E-Even if it's your day off, as a commanding officer, there are some things that are inappropriate!
Takao, if you want to come along as well, the three of us could do it~
For some reason, Takao was beet red as if she was about to shoot steam from her ears. She quickly sheathed her sword, turned around, and sprinted off.
What in the world did Atago tell her...
